title: Colab-Orange
description: To connect desingners, developers and people with ideas.
descriptionPage: If you are a designer, developer or just have an idea and want to finish your project but don't know how to fix a bug, need help with the design or maybe you would like to help other people with their work, Colab Orange is the app where you can get or provide that help. Take a look at the website and start connecting with the Colab Orange community.
features: Register by email and password or by gmail.
Create your profile with photo and description about you.
You can add links from social networks and your stack.
Fill out a form with the information about the project you would like to publish.
To collaborate with another work, fill out the form and send your help.
myTasks: Survey the team to agree on the css framework, the language of the commits and the schedule of the weekly meetings.
Creating tasks from the 'Issues' section in the GitHub repository.
Communication with the team to resolve questions about code, commands and git conflicts.

title: Task tracker (To-do list)
description: Add tasks and edit them if necessary, they will be saved in the localStorage.
descriptionPage: You can create a list of tasks with their due date, edit them without worrying that they will be deleted when you refresh the page and delete each task when are finished.
myTasks: Manage the state to save, create, delete and edit the task
features: Each task of the list will be save in the local Storage of the browser
Add date to do the task

title: Fichap
descriptionPage: An HHRR Services. Small team of 3 Frontend Developers
myTasks: Translate QA into actionable tasks for development.
features: You can select options that are presented in carousel
Once selected a plan need to fill forms to send your information
Animations on principal and accesory images

title: Marvel-Store/CMYK-sunset
description: Ecommerce to buy Marvel's comics. The user need to register with Google to buy.
descriptionPage: A web application to buy marvel comics. You can enter with your username, find the comic you are looking for and take it in your cart!
myTasks: Worked with a small team to build Marvel Store with the stack MERN (Mongo, Express, React, and Nodejs), Firebase, Sass, and Next.
features: Select a comic from Home is added to the cart

title: Skincare with Nature
description: Landing page about skincare, products, offers and news. FCC project.
descriptionPage: A freeCodeCamp project from 'Web Responsive Design' Lessons.
myTasks: Create an HTML document with properly marked up content

title: Documentation Page
description: Introduction of Inmunology in spanish. Concepts and principal definitions.

title: Tribute Page
description: I built it about my mom's favorite spanish singer, Juan Gabriel.
